title: Sun Transit in the 8th House for Leo Ascendant
summary: The Sun transiting your eighth house shifts focus toward transformation, shared resources, and inner power dynamics. Matters related to control, trust, and vulnerability come into awareness. You may feel compelled to confront fears around loss or dependency, while interest in hidden systems, research, or healing deepens. Financial ties and joint responsibilities demand clarity. When handled consciously, this transit strengthens resilience, refines authority over inner change, and brings maturity in managing shared power.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Heightened awareness of inner power and control.

sections.heading: Career
points: Research, analysis, or confidential roles suit this phase.
Authority grows through depth rather than visibility.
Power dynamics at work require discretion.

sections.heading: Relationships
points: Possessiveness can surface if ego dominates.

sections.heading: Finance
points: Joint finances and obligations come into focus.
Insurance, taxes, or inheritances need attention.
Control over shared assets is reassessed.

sections.heading: Mental & Inner State
points: Need for control softens with awareness.

closing: The Sun in the 8th house refines power through transformation. When control gives way to awareness, true inner strength emerges.
